name: react-native-ai-template
description: Full-stack React Native + Express.js AI application template

scripts.lint: cd app && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd app && npm run lint:fix && cd ../server && npm run lint:fix
scripts.format: cd app && npm run format && cd ../server && npm run format
scripts.type-check: cd app && npm run type-check && cd ../server && npm run type-check

author: Ilya Viache
